name: AggregateColumn

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the summary field.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name for the summarized or custom summary formula field.

methods.name: getDataType
methods.description: Returns the data type of the summarized or custom summary formula field.

methods.name: getAcrossGroupingContext
methods.description: Returns the column grouping in the report where the summary field is displayed.

methods.name: getDownGroupingContext
methods.description: Returns the row grouping in the report where the summary field is displayed.

description: Contains methods for describing summary fields such as Record Count, Sum, Average, Max, Min, and custom summary formulas. Includes name, label, data type, and grouping context.
